name: 葉樹開
objective: 本課程著重在使研究生能培養基礎的流體計算能力，包括二維與三維流體，使學生有基礎的張量計算能力，並希望學生能以Navier-Stoke's Equation 或是Equation of Motion 以及boundary theory解決基礎的流體問題
schedule:
1.　　Viscosity and the Mechanism of Momentum Transport
2.　　Shell Momentum Balance and Velocity Distributions in Laminar flow
3.　　The Equations of Change for Isothermal Systems
4.　　Velocity distribution with more than one independent variable
5.　　Velocity Distributions in Turbulent Flow 
6.　　Interphase Transport Isothermal Systems.
7.　　Macroscopic Balances for Isothermal Flow System
8.　　Polymeric Liquids
scorePolicy:
Homework 20%
Midterm Exam 35%
Final Exam 35%
In Class Activities:10%
materials: “Transport Phenomena”, R. Byron Bird, Warren E. Stewart, Edwin N. Lightfoot, 2nd Ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc. 2001
